entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 10:57 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: NE 22 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain or freezing rain this evening. Local rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 6:55 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Drizzle or periods of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:55 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:55 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
